replies.body: hahah report and your mum will die hahah typical chinese OCE player

Don't wanna sound racist but I couldn't agree more 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Your comments themselves are racist... Its like an Arab saying report and I will bomb your country?

Good news, stuff players have said in pre and post game chat can be used against them if you report them for it! Just be sure to add a little comment in the provided box mentioning that most of their toxicity happened in post game chat (or wherever) and it will stack up against them. 

Remember, only one report is needed to trigger a review. GL ♥

Oh for real? Then that is good news!
Thought there was no such thing as pre/post game chat log xD
Maybe a report or even a mute button would be great in pre/post game chat.
